name: I am Human
description:
You are a robot, so far so good, if it weren't for the madlad who programmed you. You are destined to race to the horizon forever. Well at least you are solar-powered, so you will have a bit of time ahead of you. Tho be wary, at night there is no sun... Well then little robot, to infinity and beyond!

Controls:
A & D: Tilt

Q & E: Turn

F: Turn flashlight on
